metadata.dc:title: Front line nurses in COVID-19 pandemic find solace in 'Hope Huddles'
metadata.dc:creator: Fawcett, Emily, RN
metadata.dc:subject: coronavirus, covid-19, public health, nurses, patients, hope, pandemics, hospitals, new york, united states
metadata.dc:description: Video by a float nurse working on one of Lenox Hill Hospital's COVID-19 units came up with the idea for "Hope Huddles," an initiative to give hope to her fellow front line health care workers.
